subject: Haptic motor information
description_text:
Dear Service team!
I’m about to purchase a haptic motor but I have a few questions.
1. I have a Moza SR-P pedal, can I mount it to it? And does the mounting
that you provide is enough?
2. What do I need to order, because I’m a bit lost honestly. Currently I
don’t have any haptic motors or anything, so no power supply and etc. What
kit do I need to order? I want it to cover every need, the power, the
control, mounting, and the motors or anything that needed.
Thank you for your help!
Best regards,
Benedek Kovacs

conversations.body_text: Hi Benedek Kovács,  You can purchase a PlusX control box for telemetry, along with one VAM Pro motor and a power supply, and that will be sufficient. For mounting, you can find and use a 3D-printed bracket available online.
